Text: The Opioid Abuse Deterrence, Research, and Recovery Act addresses overprescription by placing a limit on a patient's first opioid prescription for acute-pain to no more than seven days.pic.twitter.com/e6evmyMyte

ICYMI: Yesterday, my colleague @RepMarkMeadows and I were with @Varneyco on @FoxBusiness speaking about our new legislation, the Opioid Abuse Deterrence, Research, and Recovery Act--a bill targeting the opioid epidemic that is destroying our communities throughout the nation:pic.twitter.com/mJqxMe2bk1

91 Americans die each day due to opioid misuse.  The Opioid Abuse Deterrence, Research, and Recovery Act addresses this crisis by placing limits on a patient's first opioid prescription for acute-pain to no more than seven days.pic.twitter.com/mpzpC57FkE

The Opioid Abuse Deterrence, Research, and Recovery Act introduced today will go a long way in helping our nation get on the road to recovery by placing common-sense parameters around prescription medication.

Read my full Op-Ed published by @FoxNews here: http://fxn.ws/2i1VDE0 pic.twitter.com/gKRD5f6a6k

Today marks a step forward in our fight against the #OpioidCrisis as my colleague @RepMarkMeadows and I introduced the Opioid Abuse Deterrence, Research, and Recovery Act. Heading now to @cwru event to speak more on Ohio specific opioid prevention tactics.pic.twitter.com/dWNgcnzJox
